landing.heroSubtitle: A complete platform to conduct PBL sessions with real-time collaboration, interactive whiteboard, and integrated assessment.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything for PBL in one place
landing.featuresSubtitle: Tools designed to enhance every stage of Problem-Based Learning methodology.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Start now and discover how technology can enhance collaborative learning.

scenarios.title: PBL Scenarios
scenarios.desc: Create clinical scenarios with AI, tutor glossary, and integrated guiding questions.

presence.title: Online Presence
presence.desc: Real-time indicators show who's active. Assign coordinator and reporter roles.

chat.title: Real-Time Chat
chat.desc: Discussions integrated into the session with history by problem and tutorial session.

whiteboard.title: Advanced Whiteboard
whiteboard.desc: Shapes, arrows, editable text, and drag-and-drop to visually document discussions.

timer.title: Synced Timer
timer.desc: Timer visible to everyone, controlled by the coordinator with instant sync.

evaluation.title: Integrated Assessment
evaluation.desc: Phase-based criteria, individual grades, and continuous tracking by the professor.

s1.title: Professor creates the room
s1.desc: Defines group, scenario, and evaluation criteria

s2.title: Students join the session
s2.desc: Direct login access with real-time presence

s3.title: Active collaboration
s3.desc: Chat, whiteboard, and rotating roles during tutoring

s4.title: Integrated assessment
s4.desc: Professor evaluates in real-time by defined criteria
